item.title: Murder trial begins for Colorado dentist accused of poisoning wife's protein shakes
item.description: A Colorado dentist accused of killing his wife of 23 years by poisoning her protein shakes is on trial for murder

item.title: Former US Marine Corps reservist charged in immigration detention center shooting
item.description: Federal prosecutors have charged a former U.S. Marine Corps reservist with attempted murder after an attack at a Texas immigration detention center

item.title: Rough times for broadcast networks illustrate changing media landscape
item.description: Two milestones revealed this week illustrated the diminishing power of broadcast television in a new media world

item.title: Native American radio stations at risk as Congress looks to cut $1B in funding
item.description: Native American radio stations could face shutdowns if Congress cuts over $1 billion from the Corporation for Public Broadcasting

item.title: France, UK and Germany would restore UN sanctions
item.description: The United Kingdom, France and Germany have agreed to restore tough U.N. sanctions on Iran by the end of August if there has been no concrete progress...
